## RedemptionDetails.actualUSDHAmount property

Amount of USDH that was actually redeemed by the transaction.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
actualUSDHAmount: Decimal;
```

## Remarks

This can end up being lower than `attemptedUSDHAmount` due to interference from another transaction that modifies the list of Troves.
